/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street itself is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
